Traditionally there were some swords with bad spirits that like to kill. 
One Shadow Warriors? episode had a sword that made its possesor start 
killing people. The precious indeed!

It makes a great chanbara stchick but a legal defense... "Your honor the 
sword told me to kill him!" "Bwaaahahaha......". Kind of like an old 
Dead Kennedy's song, "God told me to skin you alive..."

Jim
